column2: U.S. Plug-in Electric Vehicle Sales by Model

PEVs include plug-in HEVs and extended range EVs, but do not include Neighborhood Electric Vehicles, Low Speed Electric Vehicles, or two-wheeled electric vehicles. Only full-sized vehicles sold in the U.S. and capable of 60mph are listed.
HybridCars.com has split sales tables into Plug-in hybrid and All-electric as of Feb 2014
PEV: Plug-in electric vehicle. These include both all-electric and plug-in hybrid electric vehicles.
PHEV: Plug-in hybrid electric vehicle. These include any vehicle that has both an electric motor and gasoline engine, including extended range electric vehicles.
